channel.title: GIT on overloaded bits
channel.description: Recent content in GIT on overloaded bits

item.title: Git Panic Commands
item.description: What to do when you screw up in GIT Consult this link: Oh shit, GIT Especially git reflog and git reset HEAD@{index}. If needed to restore the entire working directory you can for example delete everything (but not the .git repo) and do git reset --hard to rebuild the working directory.
